item.name: Cards
item.description: Search and favorite trading game cards

description.content: Search for, and list trading game cards that match a search term
(Required) The search term to find cards with
On what property to order the matching cards. Default is `name`

The sort order of the returned cards. Default is `AUTO` Sort order:
  * `ASC` - Ascending, from A to Z
  * `DESC` - Descending, from Z to A
  * `AUTO` - Allow the system choose the most inuitive direction to sort.
The page of the matching resultset to return. Default is `1`.

response.name: A paged list of cards matching the search term

description.content: (Required) The search term to find cards with

  * `AUTO` - Allow the system choose the most inuitive direction to sort.

item.name: Add a card to a user's favorites

request.name: Add a card to a user's favorites

description.content: Add a card to a user's favorites. If the card is already in the user's favorites, this operation will be ignored.
(Required) The ID of a user to retrieve

response.name: The card was added to the user's favorites

item.name: Remove a card from a user's favorites

description.content: Remove a card from a user's favorites. If the card is not in the user's favorites, this operation will be ignored.
(Required) The ID of a user to retrieve
